briefTitle: A Study of the Long-term Safety of Sativex Use
officialTitle: A Long-term, Open Label, Safety and Tolerability Study of Cannabis Based Medicine Extract in Patients Who Have Participated in a GW Clinical Study Using Cannabis Based Medicine.
summary: Subjects who had previously received GW-1000-02 in a GW study who opted to continue using it in the long-term were monitored for ongoing tolerability and evidence of clinical benefit.

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events as a Measure of Subject Safety.
